title: K-9 Mail: Refreshing all folders of all accounts?
creator: nojunk217
content:
Hi, I have "K-9 Mail 11.1" on Android 9 (and I'm hoping this is the right place for this question).

I have some Mail accounts connected to K-9, and on the left menu - a little bit above the "settings button", there is the "refesh button". It only "refreshes" all incoming folders of my accounts, but ..

- how to refresh all folders (Incoming, Output, Drafts, Send, ..) for all connected accounts with one command?

Thanks for help and advice!
metadata: ;useragent:Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64; rv:143.0) Gecko/20100101 Firefox/143.0

title: Help deletimg bulk email from TB on a phone
content:
Hi,

I have many emails oi my phone and I want to delete 80% of them. How do I do this other than 1 by 1?

Even by date would be okay I guess.

Thanks

oz
